plotter.prompt: Which plotter or printer will the tree be drawn on

authorized_values.label: VRML Virtual Reality Markup Language file (Z)

format.python: ("" , "P\n" + str(value) + "\n")[ value is not None and value != vdef ]
("", "F\n"+str(value)+"\n")[value is not None and value != vdef]

fixed_angle.prompt: Fixed angle: Are the labels to be plotted vertically (90), horizontally (0), or downwards (-90)  (L)?

format.python:
( "" , "L
F
"+ str( value ) +"
")[ value is not None and value != vdef ]

rotation.prompt: Rotation of tree (in degrees from 360 to -360) (R)

format.python: ("" , "R\n" +str( value ) +"\n" )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

arc.prompt: Angle of arc for tree (in degrees from 0 to 360)  (A)

format.python: ( "" , "A\n" + str( value ) +"\n" )[ value is not None and value != vdef]
( "" , "S\n"+ str( value )+ "\n")[ value is not None ]

("" , "M
" + str( value ) + "
" + str(vertical_margins ) + "
")[ value is not None and value != vdef ]
("", "C\n" + str( value ) + "\n" )[ value is not None and value != vdef ]

comment: <text lang="en">DRAWTREE interactively plots an unrooted tree diagram, with many options including orientation of tree and branches, label sizes and angles, margin sizes. Particularly if you can use your computer screen to preview the plot, you can very effectively adjust the details of the plotting to get just the kind of plot you want.</text> </comment>
